titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable Walter H. Capps, a Representative from the State of California.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/29/1997--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of Representative Walter H. Capps of California.
